data.actual_result: The mention uses the username until the client has been refreshed Bonus: http://i.imgur.com/60xhAVY.png
data.short_description: When viewing mentions on a server that wasn't previously visited, nickname mentions use the username (probably because the nickname hasn't been seen/cached yet)
data.steps_to_repro: - have someone else mention the user on a server you haven't visited (in this session) - visit the server and look at the mention "
